title: EP 104 "On Every Corner" with Doggy Diamonds and Melle Mel
itunes:title: EP 104 "On Every Corner" with Doggy Diamonds and Melle Mel
description:
In this episode we talk about the impending COVID vaccine travel requirements and discuss the impact that drugs and alcohol have had on our community with special guest host Doggie Diamonds. We also tap in with the homie Melle Mel to get his take on why you can find 40 ounces and cheap liquor in every hood but not in the suburbs

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
